name: Space Plant Delivery Service
description:
Congratulations on your new employment! Your job is to deliver a wide variety of exotic and, er, *mostly* harmless, space plants to customers around the space station. Oh, and on your way, watch out for the toxic waste, and that passage way without any lighting, and various hazards. Don't worry though, the plants won't eat you...yet.

Controls: A : D or arrow keys to move, Space to continue, E to interact

Programming, story and art: Sirreun

Sound design and general programming support: MusEric
